        The constructor. Creates a new state.

      • makeWind

        private void makeWind()
        This method sets a random int from -15 to +15 as wind.

      • randomizeGorillaPositions

        private void randomizeGorillaPositions(int height,
                                       int width,
                                       int[] houseHeights,
                                       eea.engine.entity.Entity gorilla1,
                                       eea.engine.entity.Entity gorilla2)
        Placing both gorillas on random houses. Valid houses are the first three and the last three.
        Parameters:
        height - window height
        width - window width
        houseHeights - array of househeights example: from 0 to 7 for 8 houses
        gorilla1 - the entity of gorilla 1 in order to get gorilla size
        gorilla2 - the entity of gorilla 2 in order to get gorilla size

      • randomizeHouses

        private int[] randomizeHouses(int[] houseHeights,
                              int houseWidth,
                              int startPointHouses,
                              int housesIndex,
                              int heigth)
        Creating a (not-so-)random map of houses.
        Parameters:
        houseHeights - the array to be used. house heights will be stored here
        houseWidth - house width
        startPointHouses - need offset so we don't have 0 pixel houses
        housesIndex - used to count through the houses
        heigth - window heigth
        Returns:
        finished array containing the house heights

      • buildTheLabel

        private java.lang.String buildTheLabel()
        Method used to build the label above the input fields.
        Returns:
        String which contains stuff like score, rounds and which turn it is.

      • someoneWon

        private void someoneWon()
                 throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Method that gets called if someone won a round. Displays explosion, makes the winning gorilla celebrate and decides whether to change to congratulationstate (=game over) or continue into next round.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - throws.

      • switchInputLabel

        private void switchInputLabel(boolean visible)
        Used to hide the input field and the text labels
        Parameters:
        visible - True/False, depending on banana flying or finished game

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Specified by:

        Specified by:

      • createRootPane

        protected RootPane createRootPane()
        Description copied from class: BasicTWLGameState
        Override this method to customize the root pane for your UI for this state.

        The theme name of the RootPane created by this method is "state"+getID(). It will also register all action methods to the rootPane.

        Do not call this method. Call BasicTWLGameState.getRootPane() instead

        When overriding this method don't call BasicTWLGameState.getRootPane() from within this method or it will lead to an endless loop.

        Overrides:
        createRootPane in class BasicTWLGameState
        Returns:
        the created root pane
        See Also:
        ActionMap.Action, ActionMap.addMapping(java.lang.Object), Widget.setActionMap(de.matthiasmann.twl.ActionMap), Widget.setTheme(java.lang.String)

      • layoutRootPane

        protected void layoutRootPane()
        Description copied from class: BasicTWLGameState
        This method is called when the layout of the root pane needs to be updated. Widget position and size should only be changed within this method.
        Overrides:
        layoutRootPane in class BasicTWLGameState
        See Also:
        Widget.setPosition(int, int), Widget.setSize(int, int), Widget.adjustSize()

      • handleEditFieldInput

        void handleEditFieldInput(int key,
                          de.matthiasmann.twl.EditField editField,
                          de.matthiasmann.twl.EditField.Callback callback,
                          int maxValue)
        Method gets called if you type something into the input field.
        Parameters:
        key - the pressed button
        editField - which field to edit
        callback - the callback on the field
        maxValue - biggest number that you may type into the editField
